name: Trap Labs
description: Follow Billy's ascent on Trap Lab's building in pursuit of pocket money in this online action puzzle. Dodge trap doors, spikes, vortices, cats on Roombas, salary-chickens, and other weird things to survive! It's a game inspired by the strange combination of RTS games and cartoons from early 2000s.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card that supports OpenGL 2.1 or better Storage: 200 MB available space
